levels.description:
Attack Interval <@ba.vup>reduced</>. The healing effect of this unit's Talent increases to <@ba.vup>{talent_scale:0%}</>, and each target healed by this unit is granted <$ba.buffres>status resistance</> for <@ba.vup>{attack@status_resistance[limit]}</> second(s)
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>
